title: 1887 Old Judge 1st Player to 100 Home Runs Harry Stovey
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: 1887 Old Judge 1st Player to 100 Home Runs Harry Stovey
posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge Harry Stovey.  Embarrassed to admit to his family that he was playing baseball, he actually changed his name for his baseball career from Harry Stowe.  Harry ended up becoming the first ever baseball player to accumulate 100 home runs.  This card is graded an SGC 20, and has excellent eye appeal.

SOLD SOLD SOLD net to me, after shipping/fees.  

[img]http://mycollectionofcards.com/baseballcards/100319/20191018_075600_001.jpg [/img]

[img]http://mycollectionofcards.com/baseballcards/100319/20191018_075613.jpg [/img]
Im interested in this card. It's really cool.  What is the best price you can do on it?
